Soghan District (Persian: بخش صوغان‎) is a district (bakhsh) in Arzuiyeh County, Kerman Province, Iran. The District has no cities. The District has one rural district (dehestan): Soghan Rural District. Soghan Rural District (Persian: بخش صوغان‎) is...
